Address: 16 River Gum Drive CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Indoor appeal, outdoor allure
Finely crafted with a blend of rich Spotted Gum hardwood floors and sublime contemporary features chosen to delight the senses, this premium family home boasts exquisite alfresco areas where you can enjoy the elegantly lush gardens.
Encapsulating Smeg and Asko appliances, the streamlined kitchen sits alongside the spacious open meals area and expansive rumpus room with huge open fireplace. The separate lounge and dining are filled with views of tranquil water features and serene outdoor spaces.
Designed to make the most of the fabulous north rear, the substantial covered alfresco is ready for entertaining every day of the year with a wood fire, built-in BBQ and rustic bar.
The ground floor study/guest bedroom with built-in robe accompanies the 4 upstairs double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms including a master bedroom with balcony, King Lake & Toolangi State Forest views, walk-in robe and suave stone bathroom.
Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and a 3-car auto garage ensure that this home ticks all the boxes for enjoyable living.
A first-class location close to prestigious schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Hills and The Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary Schools. Near Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres.
- Beautifully renovated 4 bedroom plus study home
- Close to many prestigious schools
- Huge formal and informal living zones
- Substantial covered alfresco for fabulous entertaining
- Streamlined kitchen with premium appliances
- Master bedroom with balcony, views, WIR and stone ensuite
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60 days
Land: 689 sq m approx.

Description:
$579,000 Last Chance for Free Stamp Duty
Saving the best til last. With only one remaining, here is your chance to secure your family home in a convenient location. Set at the rear of the development, you will enjoy up to 22sq of luxurious and modern living with all the trimmings you need. Offering two separate living areas, downstairs master bedroom with sleek ensuite and designer kitchen featuring stone benches and gas cooking. Entertaining will be a breeze with direct access from the living room onto the north facing courtyard. Quality fittings including Tasmanian Oak real timber flooring, stone bench top kitchens with stainless steel appliances (including gas cooktop and dishwasher), ducted heating and cooling throughout and ducted vacuuming. Ensuite and bathroom will include porcelain tiles and frameless or semi frameless shower screens and a stone top vanities.
Located only a short drive from Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and Eastland at Ringwood. Transport options include bus routes along Maroondah Highway and the train from Croydon. The Eastlink Freeway connection at Ringwood will get you into the city in just over 30 minutes. Nearby school options include Croydon Hills Primary School, Yarra Valley Grammar or Luther College. There are also a great number of parks and nature reserves are all within easy reach.
Completion is estimated to be early 2016. For more details including detailed specification, click on email the agent or call Julian on 0414 609 665.
Free Stamp Duty. The developer will pick up the bill. No strings attached.
Julian Badenach : 0414 609 665

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Tuesday 4 August at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Your Own Little Piece of Heaven
At the end of a private driveway, this delightful, character filled 4 bedroom weatherboard home presents your own little piece of heaven. From its appealing New England inspired facade with pretty window shutters to its sensational rear outlook, this is the retreat you will choose to enjoy for a lifetime.
The brand new, 2 storey home features 2 spacious ground level living areas, one a carpeted and cosy living room, the other an expansive, light and open kitchen/family/meals space with hardwood flooring. Both open out to an impressive, all-weather alfresco living/entertaining area bathed in northern light and taking in the amazingly layered view of picturesque homes, treetop surrounds and mountains near and far stretching all the way from the Dandenongs to the Yarra Ranges.
Making up the ground level floorplan is the 4th bedroom/study, downstairs WC, huge under stair storage and laundry leading out to its own service deck.
Upstairs is an open leisure/study area, main bedroom with WIR and ensuite and 2 further bedrooms with BIRs and a pristine family bathroom.
Enhancements include landscaped paths and the potential to create the garden of your dreams, double auto garage, plantation shutters, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and plumbed water tanks.
A home that will appeal across the board to families, professionals and downsizers with Yarra Road Primary School across the road and bus on Yarra Road to Luther College, Croydon Station and Chirnside Park SC. A short drive will take you to Yarra Valley Grammar, McAdam Square SC, Eastland and Eastlink.
* Character filled, 2 storey, weatherboard 4 bedroom home
* Peaceful position at the end of a private driveway
* Stunning panoramic view to the Dandenongs and Yarra Ranges
* Light and open floorplan with 3 spacious living areas
* Crisp and fresh kitchen, bathroom, ensuite and laundry
* Walk to Yarra Road Primary School and bus stop
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60/90
Land: 556 sq m approx.

Description:
Modern Style, Premium Lifestyle
Sale by Negotiation
Young and fantastically placed for privacy and convenience within an attractive setting of contemporary townhouses, this designer abode delivers a fabulous lifestyle pad for executives, downsizers and first homebuyers, as well as a secure option for investors with a quality tenancy already in place!
Ideally planned with living and accommodation set on differing levels, the free flowing ground floor flaunts rich, floating timber floors for easy living appeal; enhancing the huge living domain, bright meals space and sleek kitchen boasting Caesar stone surfaces, striking feature tile splashbacks, a breakfast bar, large pantry and quality stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher sure to impress.
Head upstairs to where the three comfortable bedrooms are housed, all fitted with generous (sliding-door) robes - two sharing a powder room and sparkling main bathroom with full-height porcelain tiling, a separate shower and bathtub; while the sizeable master further enjoys walk-in robing and a full ensuite with oversized shower.
Also included in this sophisticated residence is gas ducted heating and reverse cycle air-conditioning ensuring comfort throughout the seasons, high ceilings, ground floor restroom for guests, laundry with external access, a tidy grassed courtyard enjoying a northerly aspect, water tank, storage shed, off-street parking and a remote double garage accessing courtyard.
Resident's will appreciate the high walkability factor to Croydon North Shopping Centre, bus transport, parklands, reserves and trails all just minutes away, in addition to the easy proximity to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, quality primary and secondary schools, rail transport and the surrounding townships of Lilydale, Mooroolbark and Croydon all with plentiful shopping, cafes and eateries, not to forget all the delights of the Yarra Valley easily reached, this luxury home should not be missed. Call to arrange your inspection today!
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320

Description:
Elegant Family Living Near Top Schools
Sheer elegance awaits you in this immaculate 3 bedroom 2 bathroom family residence. Sitting proudly on the high side on a corner block, this family-friendly address is close to Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd, Croydon Hills and Yarra Rd Primary Schools. You'll love the exquisite landscaped gardens, picket fence, verandah and bay windows, while the sun-kissed interior showcases splendid views of Christmas Hills and quality decor. Discover 3 practical living spaces and a gourmet kitchen appointed with Blanco appliances and feature window. Unwind by the gas log fireplace in the formal lounge/dining room, or gather in the family/meals room. Enjoy the views over brunch in the breakfast room featuring polished floors, angled ceilings, split system and French garden doors. The private master boasts WIR, bay window and ensuite. A children's wing has two double bedrooms (BIRs) and a family bathroom. A pretty landscaped garden and herb patch will also impress you. Appointments: internal access remote double garage (workshop), ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Near transport, shops, reserves, Eastland and EastLink.
Travis Milton : 0414 404 942

Description:
Family Living At Its Best
Found in a quiet court dotted with house-proud neighbours on 844sqm (approx.), this fully renovated family paradise provides a generous zoned floorplan with modern touches and quality appointments.
From the inviting main living and formal dining areas framed by ornate arches and ceiling roses, to the sun-soaked family room of epic proportions, this is a home that promises an enviable family lifestyle. Presented like new, the interior also boasts three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a study area.
Highlights include a private master bedroom to the top floor (with large WIR, ensuite and viewing balcony), brilliant outdoor entertaining, lush gardens and plenty of off-street car parking.
Positioned in one of Croydon North's best locations - the gateway to the Yarra Valley - a vast array of amenities are close by including prestigious schools such as Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and The Good Shepherd Primary.
Additional Features:
*New appls, floors, paint, blinds, vanities & showers
*Fireplace, ducted heat, ceiling fans & 3x AC units
*Remote garage/workshop with rear roller door
*Ample storage incl. built-in robes & WI pantry
*Close to McAdam SQ & Chirnside Park Shopping
*Short drive to Eastland & the Eastern Freeway

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Situated in a peaceful family friendly cul-de-sac location, this stunning allotment on 1231m2 (approx.), surrounded by established homes, offers the ultimate canvas to design your dream home (STCA). In a highly desirable pocket of Croydon North, enjoy the convenience of living close to sporting facilities, reserves and quality schooling options to cater for all ages from kindergarten through to secondary school.
Vacant land of this size is rare indeed. With a very generous building envelope your options are almost unlimited.
Convenient to quality schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Yarra Hills/Good Sheppard Primary and Rudolph Steiner Schools, McAdams Square speciality shopping and cafe precinct, Eastland Shopping Centre, bus services and Eastlink.

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Tuesday 11 August at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Picture Perfect Family Haven
Glowing with picture book character, this charming weatherboard home is positioned on a generous 1,093 sq m (approx.) allotment allowing for a deep garden set-back and ample off street parking at the front and a superb-child friendly back garden and large alfresco living deck at the rear. Could there be a more enchanting environment in which to create a wealth of family memories?
Original period features present a touch of traditional ambiance to this extended 3/4 bedroom weatherboard home. Open fireplace, timber floors, craftsman built windows and original front door would no doubt have a story to tell.
An L-shaped living and dining room looks out to garden vistas all around. The modernised kitchen features sleek contemporary cabinetry whilst timber details connect it back to the warmth of the living area. Stainless steel appliances and a step-in pantry offer every modern convenience.
At the front of the home a large room offers a choice as a 4th bedroom, home office or sitting room. 2 further bedrooms and the stylishly renovated, skylit family bathroom sit in the centre of the home whilst at the rear a spacious main bedroom with ensuite enjoys the indulgence of a freestanding claw foot bath and access to the rear verandah.
Ducted heating, split system air-conditioners, Euro laundry, lock up garage and cubby house are further features.
In a peacefully treed locale, this gorgeous home belies its close proximity to Croydon Station and shops, Croydon Primary, Melba Secondary College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther and Oxley Colleges plus easy direct access to the amenities of Ringwood, Eastland and Eastlink.
* Charming 3/4 bedroom weatherboard home
* Treed setting on a 1,093sq m (approx.) allotment
* Expansive rear alfresco deck and family friendly garden
* Stylishly modernised kitchen and bathrooms
* Lock up garage and ample off-street parking
* Minutes to schools, shops and Croydon Station
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60/90/120 days
Land: 1,093 sq m approx.

Description:
Fantastically Positioned And Surprisingly Spacious!
Privately positioned within a small and leafy collection of just three quality homes, this exceptionally well presented, single level villa represents an astute choice for not only downsizers and first homebuyers, but also professionals and investors alike.
Enjoying street frontage and a pleasing, cream facade, the home's high ceilinged interiors, flaunting rich hardwood floors and a newly painted decor, impart a fresh and appealing impression, while the surprisingly expansive layout incorporates a large formal lounge naturally lit via north facing windows, and an open fireplace for a cosy fire on a winters evening.
The modern, well appointed kitchen, equipped with stainless-steel appliances and a dishwasher, resides centrally within the home for easy catering; overlooking both a tiled meals space, and a substantial family zone offering both secure entry from the remote garage, and sliding doors opening to the covered patio and lush, low maintenance courtyard.
In addition, three sizeable bedrooms all benefit from built-in robes and share the spotless family bathroom (with separate shower and bathtub), plus a separate toilet.
Notable highlights include gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, separate laundry and security screen doors.
This delightful abode is also enviably situated alongside a leafy walking trail accessing the local kinder, MCH Centre and playground, and just a short stroll to Croydon North Shopping Plaza and Hochkins Ridge Reserve. While a convenient proximity to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, quality schools (Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley and Luther Colleges), central Croydon offering plentiful shops, cafes, recreational facilities and railway, and Ringwood with Eastland Shopping Centre and EastLink a short drive away, ensures a most enjoyable lifestyle all ready to be immediately appreciated. Enquire now.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
An enviable family lifestyle
Prior Offers Invited.
On a large corner allotment of 866m2 (approx.) in a quiet court, this north-facing double storey home has separate living and dining zones, a big backyard and is surrounded by sought-after schools.
Parents and children can entertain separately, as the formal lounge with an open fireplace adjoins a dining room, complementing a tiled meals area and large family room. A timber kitchen is the heart of the home, boasting a dishwasher, gas cooktop and St George wall oven.
The ground floor study benefits from the 1st of 3 bathrooms, while the top floor features 4 carpeted bedrooms with built-in robes and 2 bathrooms, including the sunny master bedroom with an ensuite and deep walk-in wardrobes. The family bathroom has a separate shower and a corner spa bath.
A paved alfresco area is accessed from the meals area, extending to a large, open backyard. Further inclusions: gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, views and a double garage with a remote-controlled door.
In a family-oriented enclave, nearby schools include Croydon Hills and Yarra Road Primary Schools, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, with BMX and tennis clubs at Yarrunga Reserve.
Walk to the 672 bus, travelling between Wonga Park and Croydon station via Chirnside Park Shopping Centre. Just around the corner is McAdam Square with great cafes, restaurants and a gourmet supermarket.
HIGHLIGHTS
Separate living areas
Ducted heating
Open fireplace
Spa bath
Close to revered schools

Description:
Brand New Luxurious Townhouse $520,000+
Bordering Wonga Park, this luxurious, contemporary and spacious 6 star energy rated home is perfect for buyers requiring the convenience of location, nearby shops, transport, parks and prestige schooling options.
This brilliant architecturally designed residence features 10 foot ceilings in the living areas complimented by top of the range Smeg / Miele appliances in the kitchen with expansive stone bench tops, glass splashbacks, gloss cabinetry enhanced by soft closing drawers and imported tap ware.
This home will also feature polished solid timber floors upon entry and throughout the expansive living areas upstairs, with Porcelain tiles in the bathrooms and laundry. A media room / 4th bedroom is offered as an additional downstairs living area or extra bedroom for the growing family. Privacy is afforded by internal access from the garage.
The luxury is further enhanced by solid timber balustrading, leading up to the large entertaining and living area, with your own private large timber deck. The master bedroom features your own private ensuite consisting of porcelain tiling, stone bench tops, a huge shower in addition to the rain drenching shower head and prestige heated towel rails. Peaceful views to the Dandenongs and an oversized walk in robe also accompanies the master suite.
The bathrooms will feature stone bench tops, heated towel rails, rain drencher showerheads and porcelain tiling, along with frameless glass showerscreens.
This boutique home will also features ducted heating over two levels, evaporative cooling, remote control garage, landscaped low maintenance gardens and large under stair storage.
This stunning home is due for completion by September / October 2015. Buy now to enjoy stamp duty savings of over $25,000+.
Customise this home to your own individual palate by purchasing now. Private inspections are available by appointment only. Please contact for an inclusions list.

Description:
A Private 4 Bedroom Family Home On Around 1 1/4 Acres
IN ROOM AUCTION: WEDNESDAY 22ND JULY AT 7PM AT 5/1849 FERNTREE GULLY ROAD, FERNTREE GULLY.
Offering the ultimate family environment, this estate home on around 1 1/4 acres combines privacy and space with a host of luxury features that will please any discerning family. Secluded away from the noise and hustle with impressive views towards the Yarra Valley the home boasts a classically inspired faade that gives it a timeless and welcoming feel. Inside you find a vast living and dining area with an open fire and a near new renovated kitchen complete with stone benches, gloss cabinetry and stainless appliances including a Smeg 900mm freestanding oven/stove. Accommodation is generous too with 4 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a beautiful ensuite to complement the family bathroom. There's also a guest bedroom and a study as well as extras including ducted heating, a basement style double garage with storage room, powder room and a double carport. But there is plenty more to see here including a raised entertaining deck with those views, an in-ground pool with adjoining covered deck and the ultimate luxury feature a tennis court. And despite its seclusion the home is within minutes of buses and schools including Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar.

Description:
Double the Opportunity
ALL OFFERS TO BE IN BY MONDAY 20TH JULY AT 5PM. You'll be doubly excited about the opportunities that exist with this unique property. Behind an attractive colourbond fence sits a home that has been fully renovated from top to bottom, leaving no stone unturned. Offering 3 light filled bedrooms that are serviced by a contemporary bathroom with a deep tub, a separate shower & quality fixtures & fittings. There's an open plan living/dining/kitchen zone that forms a pleasing space for relaxation or entertainment. The lounge boasts French doors that open out to a sizeable merbau deck, overlooking the landscaped gardens in the yard. The kitchen is modern & provides good storage space; the light & dark toned cabinets/drawers complement each other well & stone benchtops & s/s Bosch appliances will please the most discerning of buyers. Extras such as 9 foot ceilings, decorative cornices, ceiling fans, GDH & a fully fitted laundry add to the appeal of this home, as does the approx. 928sqm of quality land that it sits on. The vast expanse behind the existing dwelling provides promising prospects as the property is being sold with plans & permits to build a second dwelling. The approval is for a double storey townhouse with 3 robed bedrooms, a central bathroom & ensuite plus a large open plan living/dining/kitchen zone with large doors opening to an alfresco deck at the rear. There is also a DLUG attached. This expands the opportunities that this wonderful property provides as does the sought after location. Close to many prestigious schools such as Luther College & Yarra Valley Grammar, on the doorstep of local buses, walking distance to Warrien Reserve & other green spaces plus a short drive to numerous popular shopping precincts & trains. This property provides the key to a bright future; be the one to turn it.

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
You will be most impressed by the large proportions and flexibility of the interior design, catering for the large, blended or multi - generational families.
-Providing approx. 38 squares of floor area, this stylish home will adapt easily to your specific requirements.
-Positioned to enjoy a north facing front, step inside to fully appreciate the elegant lounge-dining room, robed study, then experience the king size informal zone highlighted by the well appointed kitchen with granite bench tops adjoining the open plan casual meals and family room. Making this zone the perfect family gathering space opening onto the substantial alfresco deck, Jacuzzi and easy to maintain garden.
- With 3 robed bedrooms on this level including the privately zoned and large main bedroom with a luxury spa ensuite and abundant wall of built in robes. A sparkling contemporary bathroom completes this level.
- Downstairs, discover the air conditioned huge living room or rumpus room, perhaps a home office or bedroom option, kitchenette and bathroom plus a substantial quality workshop and storeroom. This massive downstairs area has separate keyed entry and sliding door to outside.
-The outdoor retreat includes gas mains BBQ and a delightful water feature making this a lovely entertaining sanctuary during the warmer months overlooking the landscaped garden setting.
- Gas ducted heating, 3 split system air conditioners, security system, polished floor boards, 6 solar panels, auto sprinkler system, auto double garage with internal access and excellent off street parking, ideal for a trailer, caravan etc.
-Poised on a significant allotment measuring approx. 906 square metres in this popular neighbourhood. Walk to Yarra Road Primary, near Croydon Hills Primary school, Luther College, Good Shepherd and Yarra Valley Grammar, along with McAdam Square. Handy to Eastland shopping centre plus Eastlink connections.

Description:
DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL IN DESIRABLE LOCATION ON 1189sqm
Attention all developers and builders - Let your imagination run wild with this sensational opportunity which is ideal to further develop (STCA). Situated in a prime location with maximum exposure for whatever you desire to do, the property consists of an original 1950s dwelling in absolutely immaculate condition which is perfect to lease out while plans & permits are achieved. Outside we have a carport, separate garage and all on a very low maintenance and flat block. Set on 1189m2 (approx.) and positioned in the heart of Croydon North this property offers endless possibilities in a highly progressive area with all of the infrastructure in place and within close walking distance to shops, schools and public transport.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Under Offer/Under Contract
This immaculate weatherboard home is stylish and spacious, and now awaits a lucky new family to simply move in and savour it. Featuring polished timber floors and fresh neutral decor, the home includes 4 spacious bedrooms (huge master with walk-in robe, modern ensuite, and private deck), study, sleek family bathroom, and vast lounge/dining with wood fire and leafy view. The modern kitchen has cream cabinetry, quality stainless steel appliances, bi-fold servery window to alfresco, and adjoining meals area with pretty French doors leading to the garden. Outside, a fabulous covered alfresco deck complete with 8-seater spa overlooks the beautifully landscaped garden that is fully fenced and enjoys a trickling creek water feature, Balinese hut, and lawn for playtime. Finishing touches include ducted heating and cooling, split system air conditioning, water tank, single garage/workshop, and ample off-street parking. All of this is located within easy walking distance of Croydon North shops, Griff Hunt Reserve, regular bus service, Village school and more - be quick to make it yours!

Description:
Convenient, stylish and private
PRIOR OFFERS INVITED.
Featuring prime street frontage on a block of 4 near-new residences, Unit 2 is an immaculately-presented 2 bedroom residence offering comfortable and stylish living with brilliant nearby convenience. Floating bamboo floors grace the hallway and living zone of this single-level abode, The 2 bedrooms at the front of the house feature quality carpets, wardrobes and dual privacy and blockout blinds. The master bedroom has a walk-in robe and elegant ensuite, while the skylit main bathroom is similarly styled with a semi-frameless shower. At the rear of the unit and overlooking the private garden, the kitchen is equipped with stone benchtops, a stainless steel dishwasher and Ariston cooking appliances (gas cooktop and electric oven). An open plan living and dining room has dual sliding glass and screen doors revealing a sealed alfresco area. Grooved doors further enhance the quality finishes of this freestanding modern abode, complementing gas ducted heating, Panasonic split system, instant gas HWS, European laundry, a water tank and a single garage with an automatic door and backyard access. In a location of outstanding convenience, walk to the Village school and Griff Hunt Reserve or Croydon North shopping centre, cafes and buses. Take a short drive to Chirnside Park shopping centre, handy to Eastland and EastLink.
HIGHLIGHTS
Young, single-storey unit
Generous showers
Ariston/stone kitchen
Quality doors and blinds
Ducted heating
Minutes to shops and buses

Description:
Idyllic Charm in Humber Hill!
Sale by Set Date 29/6/2015
Owner occupiers of all ages and investors are going to want to act quickly to secure this two-year young, impeccably presented, single level villa residing in 'Humber Hill', a quality collection of modern homes set close to admired amenities.
Showcasing an elegant decor, the homes generous interiors feature high ceilings and a plethora of large, north facing windows saturating the free flowing living and meals space in natural light, while providing stunning outlooks of the treed vista and hills in the distance.
Double sets of French doors access an inviting alfresco deck perfect for entertaining; while the sophisticated kitchen provides plentiful modern surfaces and glossy cabinetry, quality Westinghouse stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, a lengthy breakfast bar and double pantry.
Accommodation consists of a substantial main bedroom fitted with an entire wall of mirrored robes, enjoying ensuite-effect to the chic bathroom (separate shower and bathtub), shared with the sizable, robed second bedroom.
Further notable inclusions list as; ducted heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioner, recessed lighting, plentiful storage, separate laundry with external access, water tank, secure courtyard and remote garage with internal entry.
Exceptionally well positioned close to a choice of eminent schools (Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley and Luther Colleges), Hochkins Ridge Reserve and Croydon North Shopping Plaza, as well as easy access to Eastland Shopping Centre and EastLink, this idyllic, low-maintenance home will effortlessly surpass your expectations. Enquire now.
Proudly marketed by Barry Plant Real Estate Croydon
For further information contact Maree Slade 0419 519 282 or mslade@barryplant.com.au
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282
